. NewCondition. Product. Uruga 31mm Rubber - White rubber. The Uruga 31mm Rubber model was specifically designed for ladies. It is an elegant version of the 42mm model with highly polished clamps. In alternance to the indexes, the dial is decorated with 6 genuine diamonds.. The Uruga 31mm Rubber mod

static_fields.name: Discover Uruga 31mm Rubber | Minase Watches |Made in Japan
static_fields.description: Uruga 31mm rubber is powered with a high quality Swiss movement, every steel parts is hand-polished with the Sallaz (sarazu) technique.

hasVariant.name: Uruga 31mm Rubber - Black rubber
hasVariant.description: The Uruga 31mm Rubber model was specifically designed for ladies. It is an elegant version of the 42mm model with highly polished clamps. In alternance to the indexes, the dial is decorated with 6 genuine diamonds.
